title: Missing Worlds Missions
body: So I got the worlds master pass last week and I still have yet to get new worlds missions is this happening to any one else? Or do i have to spend more rp and get again every week? I'm kinda mad that there hasn't been any new worlds missions yet.

replies.body: You'll still be getting more Worlds Missions as Worlds progresses. They should be popping up later this week, around the same time the first set started.
It's the same for everyone. New missions for the Worlds Event will appear every week or so. Just wait until then.
